restaurants.title: Donaufelderhof
restaurants.description: A nice garden with relaxing atmosphere. Aside from traditional Austrian food you might as well order rarely seen dishes like a Langos Burger

restaurants.title: Restaurant Mader
restaurants.description: An old traditional Austrian restaurant run by a hospitable family for many years. Their masterpieces are Wiener Schnitzel and Gulasch.

restaurants.title: Gastwirtschaft Schilling
restaurants.description: They have a large selection of beer and the portion sizes are huge. It is very authentic, everything tastes so yummy.

restaurants.title: Rados Gastwirtschaft
restaurants.description: One of the best places in town to eat ribs! Friendly staff, great prices - you simply feel welcome as soon as you step in.

restaurants.title: Amerling Beisl
restaurants.description: A wonderful taste experience. Enjoy a nice evening, sitting in a patio with a slightly italian flair and fast waiters.

restaurants.title: Zwölf Apostelkeller
restaurants.description: Tucked into an unassuming side street in the 1st district, Zwölf Apostkeller is a deceptively cavernous old style beer hall, hidden in a centuries old cellar.

restaurants.title: Goldfisch
restaurants.description: Famous for its tasty seafood, this really small and simple place is highly recommended if you are into eating lobster, octopus or local fishes and don't need fancy furnishing.

restaurants.title: Fischrestaurant Bodulo
restaurants.description: Italian friends recommended this pearl.Bodulo is one of the best places to go in vienna, if you want to enjoy excellent seafood and a mediterranean atmosphere.

restaurants.title: Wulfisch
restaurants.description: A tiny, simple but addictive location!Tasty scents and a wide variety of seafood wraps, makes your mouth water as soon as you enter. Try one of the delicious salads. It is worth it.

restaurants.title: Fischrestaurant Nautilus
restaurants.description: Enjoy a relaxing and wonderful evening at the Nautilus. In the middle of the famous Naschmarkt, this place is a must go if you are into seafood.

restaurants.title: Fischrestaurant Kaj
restaurants.description: Enjoy an impressive variety of fresh fish and family-friendly ambience. Simply delicious! The owners are seemingly happy if their guests enjoy their stay.

restaurants.title: Lubin
restaurants.description: Gourmet fish and a relaxing ambience will make you come back to Lubin, one of Vienna's best fish restaurants. It is not only a nice place to have dinner but you can also buy a variety of fish to take home.

restaurants.title: Pizzeria Ruffino
restaurants.description: Quality paired with very talkative waiters. An addictive combination with a great variety of pizza, noodles and co. Convince yourself that Ruffino is worth a visit.

restaurants.title: Disco Volante
restaurants.description: With a pizza oven shaped like a huge disco ball in the middle of the room, which the restaurant owns its name to, eating pizza becomes an adventure. Rumour has it that even italians admire their pizza-baking-skills!

restaurants.title: Pizza Randale
restaurants.description: You want fresh ingredients on a delicious pizza? Then make sure you got to Pizza Randale early enough because in the evenings it is always crowded. The food is just yummy.

restaurants.title: Via Toledo Enopizzeria
restaurants.description: Owner Francesco Calò was voted world's best pizza cook in Salerno. Furthermore Via Toledo surprises with innovative Pizza creations. Definitely worth a visit, or two or three....

restaurants.title: Bio-Pizzeria Vero
restaurants.description: Vero is said to be Vienna's first organic Pizza restaurant, setting also a new appearance-trend. Oriental lamps mix with industrial ambience. Aside from the full grian pizza you should definitely try the Nutella-pizza if you prefer it sweet.

restaurants.title: Pizzeria Mafiosi
restaurants.description: Surrounded by wooden furniture and maritime decoration, eating Pizza at Mafiosi feels a little bit like being on a pirate ship. Be very hungry when you go there, the portions are large and of course inviting.

restaurants.title: Addicted to Rock Bar & Burger
restaurants.description: A drink and a burger with Rock n'Roll - flair. Sounds tempting? We agree. All the burgers are tasty but the Addicted-Burger not only tastes good but comes with a black bread. Two thumbs up for this small sister of the Hardrock Cafe.

restaurants.title: Omnom Burger
restaurants.description: Lots of different burgers with additional ingredients to choose from. Omnom is widespread in Vienna and we are a fan too. Enjoy a fresh-made burger in a relaxing and simple surrounding.

restaurants.title: Teddy's American Burger
restaurants.description: If you are a fan of the Back to the future movies you will love this diner. Have a tasty burger and feel like you woke up in the 50ies. Worth a visit.

restaurants.title: Weinschenke - Feinste Burger
restaurants.description: One would not expect such delicious burger creations in a restaurant with such misleading name. This is an insider tip from us. The food is marvellous, the furnishing unexpected for a burger location. Check out the extra-ordinary paintings on their wall.

restaurants.title: Burger's Bar Wien
restaurants.description: Probably the biggest burgers in town we know. The air smells of barbecue, the street outside a bit noisy but who cares when you are about to bite in a tasty, fresh burger.

restaurants.title: Hawidere Beer & Burger
restaurants.description: A cult place for burger and music lovers. Enjoy tasty burger variations and occasionally you are accompanied by local bands while your eating. Authentic and down to earth.
